name: Across The Vast Lands
description:
This is a prototype of a narrative game I created during the MechJam II.

Being only a prototype, the game obviously lacks polish and content. Also some mechanics I had in mind didn't make it to this version due to time constraints.

Maybe one day I will make a full game of it, maybe not, depends how my other projects go.

However, if you liked it (or not), feel free to leave a comment and maybe support me!

Disclaimer: May have some bugs
